segments.text: I see a woman drying dishes by the sink, and it looks so normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being sneaky, trying to get cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on a stool, and it looks a bit dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like it's the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will notice the water before it gets any worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, it's a nice contrast to the inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the kids don't get caught, but I also hope they don't get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just so ordinary, but with a hint of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm everything seems when there's so much going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could be there to see what happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all just so interesting to observe.
segments.speaker: PAR
